Title: Terror of the Dread Wastes
Description:
That thing is huge!

The Shado-Pan holding the battlefront were never trained for something like this... let's get down there and take it out ourselves.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Norvakess, the Terror of the Dread Wastes.
RewardText:
You. You're coming with me.

I've never seen someone handle themselves on the battlefield like that. I need a strong $c like you with me when we face the Sha of Hatred.
